fields.title: Where should we eat?
fields.description: Vote on restaurant/eating possibilities so we can narrow down the options a bit!

fields.title: What game should we play?
fields.description: Feel free to add games. Looking for co-op games - especially local co-op.

fields.title: What's everyone's favorite candy?
fields.description: Feel free to add new ideas, and vote on ideas submitted by other users.
